go-termination-calculator
=========================

Usage:

```
go run ./cmd --epoch 3559748 --sector-size 32 --qap-position 9759082362841844682881538327065773703263060121749055791461 --qap-velocity -7580969881544121507823389406846038852149922941494925 --reward-position 16782941870422397609460720690127419622109456322625328327505 --reward-velocity -26722374235001584454611811757655045006281911162321526 --activation 3395382 --expiration 4944643 --deal-weight 0 --verified-deal-weight 0 --expected-day-reward 188054129953956 --expected-storage-pledge 3707397053860264 --power-base-epoch 0 --replaced-day-reward 0
16871186150637184
```
